name: Artur Petrusanco
description: I’m a Senior Front-end Developer with 15 years of experience. Over my career, I’ve developed more than 100 Shopify websites (including headless implementations) and over 300 WordPress themes.

employers.name: Senior Front-end Developer / Front-end Team Lead at Route One Group, Chisinau
employers.description: I led the development of the company’s websites and was subsequently promoted to Team Lead, where I oversaw and contributed to two additional key projects. In this role, I made strategic decisions that shaped the success of these initiatives.
employers.skills: Next.js, Nuxt.js, TypeScript, Storyblok, styled-components, Tailwind CSS, Figma, Postman, Swagger

employers.name: Senior Front-end Developer at Eya.global
employers.description: Successfully transitioned a client from WordPress to Next.js and Contentful, improving site speed by 40% and enhancing SEO performance.

employers.name: Front-end Developer / Senior Front-end Developer at Cyberworkshop
employers.description: I began as a theme developer for Shopify. Over time, my experience and expertise grew, leading me to a senior position.
employers.skills: JavaScript, jQuery, Next.js, React Native, Shopify

employers.name: Front-end Developer / Senior Front-end Developer at Fuselabcreative
employers.description: I developed complex client websites featuring extensive animations and worked on a SaaS project that spanned over a year.

employers.name: Front-end Developer / Senior Front-end Developer at Heartbeat.ua
employers.description: The designers at Heartbeat were the most skilled I’ve had the pleasure of working with, and their expertise helped me master pixel-perfect design.

education.name: UTM Engineering of Heat and Gas Supply, Ventilation Systems at Technical University of Moldova, Chisinau
